directions.How: Follow all signs for the town centre. Either coming from Cork, Clonmel, Limerick or Waterford, this will lead you to the main square in Cahir. Cahir House Hotel is located here.

description: Located in the centre of Cahir town, with ample parking at the rear, Cahir House Hotel has excellent baby changing facilities and private breastfeeding facilities

nearby.shop: Yes - An abundance of shops in Cahir town
nearby.petrol: Yes - Several located on the outskirts of Cahir

name: Cahir House Hotel
